dict.acceptation: （根据权利而提出的）要求；声称；断言；索赔；

sent.orig: In our country, the claim pattern of the current joint liability is a free claim pattern.
sent.trans: 我国现行连带责任的求偿模式是任意求偿模式。

sent.orig: Any dependent claim shall only refer to the preceding claim or claims.
sent.trans: 从属权利要求只能引用在前的权利要求。

sent.orig: No such pre-assesment of claim construction. Claim construction incorporated into full trial.
sent.trans: 对所主张权利的定义不在审判前进行评审，而是被包含在整个审判过程中。

sent.orig: Article 21 The patent claim shall have an independent claim, and may also contain subordinate claims.
sent.trans: 第二十一条权利要求书应当有独立权利要求，也可以有从属权利要求。

sent.orig: He did not want to claim social superiority, he would not claim intrinsic personal superiority.
sent.trans: 他不想炫耀优越的社会地位，他也不会炫耀他个人出众的内在力量。
